= JSX

https://reactjs.org/docs/introducing-jsx.html

Babel transpiles JSX into regular javascript.

== Fragment

[,jsx,title='fragment']
----
<>
    {/* This is a fragment */}
</>
----

or 

[,jsx,title='fragment']
----
<Fragment>
    {/* This is a fragment */}
</Fragment>
----

== Tags

|===
|HTML |React |Remarks
|class
|className
|

|maxlength
|maxLength
|

|tabindex
|tabIndex
|

|for
|htmlFor
|
|===

== Props

Props are like attributes in HTML

[,jsx]
----

function ... {
    return (
        <MyComponent my_prop_name={ my_prop_value } />
    )
}
// ...

function MyComponent({ my_prop_name }) {
    // ...
    return (
        { my_prop_name }
    )
}
----


== Comments

https://wesbos.com/react-jsx-comments

[,jsx]
----
{/* A JSX comment */}

{/* 
  Multi
  line
  comment
*/}
----
